body_html: There is a bug with loading libcuda.dylib - the default cuda install creates libcuda.dylib, but tensorflow tries to load libcuda.1.dylib . This fails, resorting to using the LD_LIBRARY_PATH which if NULL crashes. If you copy libcuda.dylib to libcuda.1.dylib it loads fine.

body: There is a bug with loading libcuda.dylib - the default cuda install creates libcuda.dylib, but tensorflow tries to load libcuda.1.dylib .  This fails, resorting to using the LD_LIBRARY_PATH which if NULL crashes.  If you copy libcuda.dylib to libcuda.1.dylib it loads fine.
